_header: Hail Holy Father of the high country
Subjects: Francis of Assisi, saint, prayer to; prayers, to saints
_description: James Ryman, A prayer to St. Francis — one stanza rhyme royal

CULEe112.First Lines:
Hayle holy fader of the high CuntreyOf frere mynours the beawtie
                    & light…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Out of this lyfe when we shull wendeTo blisse lede vs that
                    hath noon ende
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.
